scripts.prod: set NODE_ENV=production&&concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client" "npm run sass" "npm run sass-min"
scripts.dev: set NODE_ENV=development&&concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client" "npm run sass" "npm run sass-min"
scripts.debug: set NODE_ENV=debug&&concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client" "npm run sass" "npm run sass-min"
